content.question: The painting was surprising to its original audience mainly because

choices.label: it depicted laborers on a grand scale
its innovation earned the artist admittance to the Salon
its figures are placed within an idealized landscape

content.answer: it depicted laborers on a grand scale

topic.text: 4.2: Purpose and Audience in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
